channel.title: Comments for page "11DBHK's Purple Shades"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "11DBHK's Purple Shades"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: This item was given to those people who did not use there stamina when the stamina bug happened. I don't think it will happen again, so lucky those who got them.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: lets put it this way, you wont get it.

item.title: How to Obtain
item.content:encoded: Um.. the "how to obtain" doesn't seem very informative. Was it a one time give out for not exploiting a bug that was in the game? Or is there a current bug in the game that's closely monitored like a test of morals? It doesn't seem very thorough so I'm looking for some clarification :) Thanks.
